a.n: Tel Aviv Sessions: Avi Lebovich Orchestra

p.k: The legendary Yellow Submarine Jazz Club in Jerusalem presents trombonist Avi Lebovich and his Orchestra. The Orchestra is a contemporary incarnation of the traditional big band, combining jazz with different musical influences.
p.d: The bustling streets of Tel Aviv resonate in the music of the new generation of Israeli jazz artists, who are making a big impression in the jazz scene. The DJAZZ series 'Tel Aviv Sessions' is the thermometer of jazz in Israel in the first decade of the 2000s.The concerts featured in this series were recorded at several Tel Aviv jazz clubs, featuring some of the very best and freshest jazz bands. The series offers an eye-witness account of the incredible inventiveness and diversity of the Israeli jazz scene. The legendary Yellow Submarine Jazz Club in Jerusalem presents trombonist Avi Lebovich and his Orchestra. The Orchestra is a contemporary incarnation of the traditional big band, combining jazz with different musical influences such as funk, rock and ethnic. The 13-man orchestra shows its limitless powers of musical expression.
